avatar-group.flipAnimation: On hover, avatar moves to front (z-index) and scales to 110%. Transition: 200ms ease-out.
avatar-group.layout: margin-top: 16px, margin-bottom: 0. Override via style prop.
avatar-group.tooltip: Use AvatarGroupItem + AvatarGroupTooltip. AvatarGroup accepts tooltipClassName (applied to all tooltips). Each item: AvatarGroupItem > Avatar (+ AvatarFallback) + AvatarGroupTooltip (children: name, role, etc.). Tooltip shows on hover with same properties as reference (flex flex-col gap-0.5 text-center, etc.).
